name: Drowzee
flavorText:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.

previous.name: Onix
previous.flavorText:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.

next.name: Hypno
next.flavorText:
When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.
